price: 43. Ar jie pasiėmė (kitus) kaip tarpininkus šalia Allaho? Sakyk: „Net jei jie neturi galios niekam ir neturi proto?“
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi shufaʿāa qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shayan walā yaʿqilūna
